name: Robe of Judgment
description: It is not only a symbol of the divine status of the judgment, but also a sacred blessing against the curse of the devil, and when magic swordsman Thanatos became the victim of the curse of Satan Morocc, it is default code for all opponents of devil wear blessed clothes.
